result.execSummary:
The defendant Blaise Scott Klim Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
All amounts due are to be paid at a rate of $100 per month commencing November 1, 2022 and the 1st of each month thereafter until paid in full. There is a $15 administrative fee for any payment plan and any change to a payment plan. The fee will be added to the first payment. If not paid, a judgment shall be entered.

Defendant shall contact the Washington County Jail within 3 days for purposes of supplying a biological specimen for DNA analysis. Defendant has the right to request expungement of DNA analysis in writing through the Department of Justice.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Blaise Scott Klim Jr

records.addlTxt: Defendant Blaise Scott Klim Jr in court. Prosecuting attorney Mandy A. Schepper in court for the State of Wisconsin. Def does not have valid DL. Def currently in treatment. Def requests to resolve. Def pleads guilty; is convicted and sentenced.

Prosecuting attorney Mandy A. Schepper in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Blaise Scott Klim Jr not in court. Def advised he had no ride to court. DEFENDANT MUST APPEAR on adjourned date or warrant will issue. Plea hearing scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Plea hearing on September 14, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Plea hearing on August 10, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Plea hearing on July 13 at 8:15 am reset to Aug 10, 2022 at 8:15 am per request of def due to work obligation. Def also still working on obtaining a valid DL. Notice sent.

Prosecuting attorney Jeanette Kara Corbett in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Blaise Scott Klim Jr in court. Def hopes to pay fee this week and then can reinstate. Plea hearing scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Plea hearing on July 13, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Prosecuting attorney Mark David Bensen in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Blaise Scott Klim Jr in court. Def has appt for assessment on 5-5-22. Plea hearing scheduled for May 25, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Plea hearing on May 25, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

Prosecuting attorney Stephanie L Hanson appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Blaise Scott Klim Jr appeared by video, in custody. Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights, and probable cause found. Def states he lost his paperwork containing the court date. Def eligible to reinstate DL on 4/19/22. Def waives counsel to PT. Case passed and recalled; PT held. Def hopes to attempt to reinstate DL before proceeding. Hearing scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Prosecuting attorney Allison E. Cogbill appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Blaise Scott Klim Jr not in court. Warrant and bail forf ordered.
Initial appearance on February 14, 2022 at 08:15 am.
